body_html:
Nowadays TensorFlow does autotuning by itself. For example: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/core/kernels/conv_ops.cc#L657 For most conv operations, filters transformation is a small overhead compared to the actual computation. However, this might not be true in extreme cases. So yes, eventually filter_format support might be needed somewhere down the road.
…

body:
Nowadays TensorFlow does autotuning by itself. For example:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/core/kernels/conv_ops.cc#L657

For most conv operations, filters transformation is a small overhead
compared to the actual computation. However, this might not be true in
extreme cases. So yes, eventually filter_format support might be needed
somewhere down the road.
